name: Taberna Sanationis
description:
a game by Mozes developed for the MFGJ: Summer 2022

You are a worker in a tavern for heroes that fought in an ongoing war and wish to seek refuge to regain their strength. Deliver orders to customers to restore their health and mana. But do it quickly! These warriors could not wait to return to battle.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • LMB - Interact
  • Escape - Pause/Unpause

(P.S: The game is still under development lol)
